ComicInfo.Summary:
THE SHADOW GIRL, PART ONE
As the search continues for Skye and Lance, things get heated as Ali stands trial for his perceived role in their disappearance. With the minds behind Arcane Acre at a crossroads, Bloody Bones unites the villains of the Grimm Universe with a plan to plunge the world into a living nightmare.
